name: Trevixia
slogan: Inspired by Nature. Built for Technology
description: Trevixia is an IT product-based startup that builds elegant, resilient software products. Our name is inspired by the Trevesia palmata — the snowflake plant — a symbol of growth, resilience, and quiet strength.
shortDescription: We build software products that are elegant, resilient, and alive with innovation.

brand.plantDescription: The Trevesia palmata — commonly known as the snowflake plant — is a striking tropical species known for its large, deeply lobed, snowflake-shaped leaves. Native to the Himalayas and Southeast Asia, it thrives in diverse conditions while maintaining its unique beauty.

mission: To build software products that matter — solutions that are not just technically brilliant, but thoughtfully designed to create lasting impact.

values.title: Growth
values.description: We grow steadily, just like the snowflake plant — with patience, intention, and resilience.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We question the status quo and build forward-thinking solutions that push boundaries.

values.title: Craft
values.description: Every pixel and every line of code is a deliberate act of care. Quality is non-negotiable.

values.title: Transparency
values.description: We build trust through openness — with our team, our partners, and our community.
